section.name: Avalon Products
section.p: Avalon consists of a number of products and sub-projects supporting service and component management.

td.p: The framework collection includes a component meta model used to describe component dependencies towards a container, the classic framework APIs that describe the runtime contact between a container and a component, and container utilities
A container is a platform supporting the management of components. This page provides links to Avalon's reference implementation, general containment theory, and references to legacy products.
The components page provides a summary of the two main component groups in Avalon.
